text: Stewart John Llewellyn Bevan (10 March 1948 â€“ February 2022) was a British actor. He was best known for his roles in Brannigan (1975), The Ghoul (1975), House of Mortal Sin (1976), Ivanhoe (1982), Chromophobia (2005) and The Scouting Book for Boys (2009). He played Clifford Jones in Doctor Who (1973) and Ray Oswell in Emmerdale (1977). Bevan died in February 2022, at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2022 deaths Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:British stage actors Category:Actors from London
title: Stewart Bevan
